profile.name: Rishit Murarka
profile.summary: Software Developer and Machine Learning Engineer with experience in full-stack development, AI/ML model deployment, and SaaS product development. Proven track record in leading technical teams, building scalable APIs, and developing AI-powered solutions. Co-founded a successful lead generation platform serving digital service providers.

educations.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Information Technology
descriptions: Relevant Coursework: Data Structures and Algorithms, Databases, Operating Systems, Machine Learning, Web Development
Co-founded SaaS platform specializing in lead generation for digital service providers including web development, animation, video production, graphic design, and digital marketing agencies
Developed and deployed an automated bot system to identify and qualify fresh and warm leads for freelancers and agencies
Built core software product from conception to deployment, handling both frontend and backend development
Collaborated with co-founder to define product roadmap, technical architecture, and business strategy
Managed active client relationships and implemented feedback-driven product improvements
Developed scalable lead scoring algorithms and automated outreach systems

workExperiences.jobTitle: Machine Learning Engineer & Software Developer Intern
descriptions: Developed and optimized ResNet50-based plant classification model achieving high accuracy through feature extraction and hyperparameter tuning
Annotated and preprocessed 1000+ images using Roboflow for robust model training and validation
Designed and implemented Flask-based RESTful APIs with JWT authentication middleware from scratch
Built WhatsApp chatbot integration using Meta API for automated customer interactions
Engineered voice cloning model enabling dynamic speech synthesis for personalized video content
Led cross-functional team in API integration, troubleshooting, and client requirement gathering
Implemented rigorous error handling and performance testing protocols for production-ready systems
Designed AI system leveraging transformer architecture to convert natural language prompts into optimized code snippets
Integrated Large Language Model for dynamic code generation and optimization
Built automated testing framework with comprehensive test case generation
Technologies: LlamaIndex, LLM, Python, API Integration, Asynchronous Programming
Developed deep learning lipreading system achieving 95.2% accuracy and 11.4% Word Error Rate on unseen speakers
Implemented CNN-RNN architecture with CTC loss for spatiotemporal sequence alignment
Applied data augmentation techniques for model robustness and built FastAPI web application with Google OAuth
Technologies: TensorFlow, CNNs, RNNs, CTC Loss, Computer Vision, FastAPI, MongoDB
Created ML application optimizing gym routines using dataset of 1000+ exercises with 17 detailed features
Built recommendation system identifying under-targeted muscles and providing personalized workout suggestions
Achieved adoption by 300+ personal trainers through enhanced user experience and fitness outcomes
Technologies: BERT, NLP, Machine Learning, Python, Recommendation Systems, Data Analysis
Smart India Hackathon 2024 Winner September 2024
Won national-level government-sponsored innovation competition addressing real-world challenges
Developed comprehensive AI-driven solution and web platform for Ministry of Indian Post Office
Created system to promote insurance and financial aid schemes, enhancing public outreach and engagement
Collaborated with team to deliver production-ready solution under tight deadline constraints
Launched hybrid dropshipping and direct-selling e-commerce platform specializing in premium sneakers
Implemented secure payment systems and user-friendly website interface
Executed multi-channel digital marketing strategy targeting sneaker enthusiasts and collectors
Generated Rs. 25,000 in revenue during first year of operations
